name: Yansong Feng 0002
content: yansongSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYansong FengAssociate ProfessorAffiliation: Wangxuan Institute of Computer Technology of Peking UniversityPhone: (86-10)82529544E-mail: fengyansong (AATT) pku.edu.cnOffice: Level 4, WICTI am an associate professor in the Wangxuan Institute of Computer Technology (former ICST) at Peking University. I am affiliated with the group of Web Information Processing. Before that, I worked with Prof. Mirella Lapata and obtained my PhD from the School of Informatics at the University of Edinburgh. Prior to Edinburgh, I worked with Prof. Jufu Feng on pattern recognition at Peking University.on Google Scholar on DBLPGoogle SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
